operating_fees.type: Aircraft and helicopters up to MTOW 1000 kg
Aircraft and helicopters over MTOW 1000 kg

other_information: Providing information to known traffic in English language O/R in advance. Arrival/departure of motorized aircraft or aircraft with a total length greater than or equal to 9 m or a maximum fuselage width greater than 2 m is permitted only after prior agreement with the AD operator (provision of rescue and firefighting services).
